Package com.github.nateowami.solve4x.solver

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Algorithm
    An abstract type for all solving strategies to extend.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Equation
    Represents an algebraic equation
    Expression
    Represents an algebraic expression with positive and negative terms
    Number
    Represents a number/fraction/mixed-number such as 35, 45/6, 56<36><32>, and provides methods for adding, subtracting, multiplying, and dividing numbers.
    Solution
    Represents a solution for a given equation or expression by holding a Step ArrayList.
    Solver
    Solves equations and simplifies expressions
    Step
    Represents a single step in solving or simplifying an equation or expression
    Term
    Provides a way to work with terms in equations.
    Util
    Provides static utility methods for use with String equations.
    Validator
    Checks to see if an expression or equation is valid.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SolveFor
    Represents the possible different ways to solve.
